channel.title: TestScape Glitch - Fixable?
channel.description:
Well, I was messing around today on one of my test servers, and I happened to use TestScape. I was training on the Level 2 Men with 60k Hp (lol, really bored) and I hit 135 HP. About 10 minutes later, after continuously slaughtering the Men, my Hp went 0/99 and it showed 0/0 over my head. This has happened to me on RamyScape before, and I thought it was just a little glitch inside Ramy's coding, but come to find out it's a TestScape glitch.
Is there a way to fix this? If so, please tell me. ;)
I attached some pictures below.

item.title: TestScape Glitch - Fixable?
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

I’m not hosting it, I was just running it on my computer for me only.

Read full topic

oh ok there’s a problem :o :o :o
what your server name i will go on it and see if i can fix it kk?

item.title: TestScape Glitch - Fixable?
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

Well, it’s annoying over anything. You have to do Blood Barrage just to attack anything again. If you don’t, everything will kill you…

Read full topic
